mapper.select: SELECT*FROM property WHERE property_type = #{property_type} AND property_cate = #{property_cate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO property (property_title, property_type, property_cate, property_addr, post_code, price, deposit, property_size, bedrooms, bathrooms, description, property_year, reg_date, property_count) VALUES (#{property_title}, #{property_type}, #{property_cate}, #{property_addr}, #{post_code}, #{price}, #{deposit}, #{property_size}, #{bedrooms}, #{bathrooms}, #{description}, #{property_year}, now(), 0)

INSERT INTO property_option (aircon, refrigerator, washing_machine, shower_booth, sink, induction, fire_alarm, veranda, tub) VALUES (#{aircon}, #{refrigerator}, #{washing_machine}, #{shower_booth}, #{sink}, #{induction}, #{fire_alarm}, #{veranda}, #{tub})
INSERT INTO security (storage_box, cctv, door_lock, intercom, entrance_security, bodyguard) VALUES (#{storage_box}, #{cctv}, #{door_lock}, #{intercom}, #{entrance_security}, #{bodyguard})
